TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi beforefieldinit BitmapFactory/Options extends Java.Lang.Object

Docs.summary: To be added.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Create a default Options object, which if left unchanged will give the same result from the decoder as if null were passed.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(native int javaReference, valuetype Android.Runtime.JniHandleOwnership transfer) cil managed

Docs.param: A containing a Java Native Interface (JNI) object reference.
Docs.summary: A constructor used when creating managed representations of JNI objects; called by the runtime.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.InBitmap : Android.Graphics.Bitmap with get, set

Docs.summary: If set, decode methods that take the Options object will attempt to reuse this bitmap when loading content.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.InDensity : int with get, set

Docs.summary: The pixel density to use for the bitmap.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.InDither : bool with get, set

Docs.summary: If dither is true, the decoder will attempt to dither the decoded image.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.InInputShareable : bool with get, set

Docs.summary: This field works in conjuction with inPurgeable.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.InJustDecodeBounds : bool with get, set

Docs.summary: If set to true, the decoder will return null (no bitmap), but the out... fields will still be set, allowing the caller to query the bitmap without having to allocate the memory for its pixels.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.InMutable : bool with get, set

Docs.summary: If set, decode methods will always return a mutable Bitmap instead of an immutable one.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.InPreferQualityOverSpeed : bool with get, set

Docs.summary: If inPreferQualityOverSpeed is set to true, the decoder will try to decode the reconstructed image to a higher quality even at the expense of the decoding speed.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.InPreferredColorSpace : Android.Graphics.ColorSpace with get, set

Docs.summary: If this is non-null, the decoder will try to decode into this color space.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.InPreferredConfig : Android.Graphics.Bitmap.Config with get, set

Docs.summary: If this is non-null, the decoder will try to decode into this internal configuration.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.InPremultiplied : bool with get, set

Docs.summary: If true (which is the default), the resulting bitmap will have its color channels pre-multipled by the alpha channel.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.InPurgeable : bool with get, set

Docs.summary: If this is set to true, then the resulting bitmap will allocate its pixels such that they can be purged if the system needs to reclaim memory.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.InSampleSize : int with get, set

Docs.summary: If set to a value > 1, requests the decoder to subsample the original image, returning a smaller image to save memory.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.InScaled : bool with get, set

Docs.summary: When this flag is set, if #inDensity and #inTargetDensity are not 0, the bitmap will be scaled to match #inTargetDensity when loaded, rather than relying on the graphics system scaling it each time it is drawn to a Canvas.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.InScreenDensity : int with get, set

Docs.summary: The pixel density of the actual screen that is being used.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.InTargetDensity : int with get, set

Docs.summary: The pixel density of the destination this bitmap will be drawn to.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.InTempStorage : System.Collections.Generic.IList<byte> with get, set

Docs.summary: Temp storage to use for decoding.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: To be added.

Docs.summary: Flag to indicate that cancel has been called on this object.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.OutColorSpace : Android.Graphics.ColorSpace with get, set

Docs.summary: If known, the color space the decoded bitmap will have.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.OutConfig : Android.Graphics.Bitmap.Config with get, set

Docs.summary: To be added.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.OutHeight : int with get, set

Docs.summary: The resulting height of the bitmap.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.OutMimeType : string with get, set

Docs.summary: If known, this string is set to the mimetype of the decoded image.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.OutWidth : int with get, set

Docs.summary: The resulting width of the bitmap.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void RequestCancelDecode() cil managed
abstract member RequestCancelDecode : unit -> unit override this.RequestCancelDecode : unit -> unit

Docs.summary: This can be called from another thread while this options object is inside a decode... call.
